info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 6:27PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Rio Blanco County through 700 PM MDT... At 627 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Meeker, or 37 miles southwest of Craig, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Meeker around 640 PM MDT. This includes Colorado 13 between mile markers 40 and 49. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
